title: Drawing, "Desk:: Seating on Left,  Center Drawer-Horizontal Pull with Ball Endpieces, Two Open Shelves on Short Side- Right", September 30, 1933
markings: Stamped in black ink: at lower right, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite thoughout. Inscribed in graphite in lower right hand corner [Deskey #] 733[missing digit]. Inscribed in red colored pencil at lower right, P.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk:: Seating on Left,  Center Drawer-Horizontal Pull with Ball Endpieces, Two Open Shelves on Short Side- Right", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite, red colored pencil. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1773.
